infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Cruise needs location access to provide turn-by-turn navigation and find nearby places.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Cruise needs location access to provide turn-by-turn navigation and find nearby places.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Cruise uses your microphone to understand voice commands for hands-free navigation.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Cruise may use your camera for augmented reality navigation features.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Cruise to use your location for navigation.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Cruise to access your microphone for voice commands.
